author: Special Correspondent
text:
Namperumal being taken in golden Garuda Sevai as part of Thai Utsavam in in Srirangam on Monday.— PHOTO: M. SRINATH

A large number of devotees offered worship to Namperumal on the occasion of Garuda Sevai on Monday. The event forms part of the ‘Thai’ car festival at the temple. Namperumal was taken on the Garuda Vahanam in the evening.

Namperumal was taken from the Veereswaram Asthanamandapam by ‘pallakku’ marking the beginning of the Garuda Sevai.
title: Golden Garuda Sevai dazzles devotees
